page.title: 15SCHOOLS IN CHILMARK/TEFFONT
page.content: {Chilmark School}was founded in{1860 and averaged about{50 pupils}until incorporated into the three tier system it lost all pupils over 9 years old and numbers fell sharply to about 20. Half the children come from {Fonthill Bishop}2 miles to the west. The school specialises in topics in {Rural Studies}which incorporate crafts as well as writing, drawing and number The present headmaster has many interests which he uses to encourage his pupils especially photographing the children working on their projects and his interest in spinning, dyeing and weaving. {Teffont School}closed in 1935. The small children go to the First School in Dinton. After the age of nine the children of both villages go by bus to schools outside their villages. AMcG
